column2: (let ((orig (current-buffer)) (buf (get-buffer-create " *vm-load-shebang-src*"))) (unwind-protect (progn (set-buffer buf) (erase-buffer) (insert "#!/usr/bin/env emacs --script") (insert (char-to-string 10)) (insert ";; -*- lexical-binding: t; -*-") (insert (char-to-string 10)) (insert "(setq vm-load-shebang-probe lexical-binding)") (insert (char-to-string 10)) (insert "(setq vm-load-shebang-fn (let ((x 41)) (lambda () (+ x 1))))") (insert (char-to-string 10)) (write-region nil nil vm-load-shebang-source nil nil)) (set-buffer orig) (kill-buffer buf)))
